page.title: 15 TOURIST ATTRACTIONS
page.content: 1.{Otterton Mill}:there has been a water-mill on this site for a thousand years.The mill has been restored and is in working order.There are numerous exibitions,plus a potter and a wood- carver.Cream teas are also sold. 2.{Bicton Gardens}:Members of the Rolle & Clinton families were keen botanists & the gardens have been open to the public since restoration in 1961. Original attractions included a narrow-gauge railway,international greenhouses & gardens.Recent additions in this theme park are a Country Life Museum,theÂ£World of Tomorrow'& the Â£World of Relaxation';Bicton is,in fact,{Â£A One Stop Day-Out'.} 3.{River Otter}:a very popular walk in E.Devon is N.& S.along the Otter flood-plain,it is also an area of private fishing.This may be combined a cream-tea in one of the villages.
